name: Train Survivors
description:
INTRODUCTION

Train Survivors is a Vampire Survivors-inspired game where you control a train that is being attacked by zombies.  You cannot slow down.

CONTROLS
  • AD/LeftRight — Turn
  • W/Up — Boost
  • ESC — Pause
  • Alt+F4 — Exit
UPGRADES

WEAPONS

  • Gun — Fires bullets
  • Bomb — Drops bombs behind the train
  • Firetrail — Leaves a trail of fire behind the train
  • Ram — Your locomotive's ramming ability
  • Sword — Holds a sword out that damages enemies

PASSIVES

  • MaxHealth — Increases max HP by 25 (current hp is increased relative to the new max)
  • HealthRegen — Regenerate health over time
  • Damage — Upgrade all damage by 10%
  • Cooldown — Reduce all cooldowns by 10%
  • Speed — Increase train speed by 10%
